pr_title: Add non null checks to GuiUtilBase

timeline.message: Add non null checks to GuiUtilBase

timeline.bodyText:
No need for // NOI18N in either of these lines. // NOI18N is used for constant strings, like "MyTurnout".
Except that, everything looks fine.
timeline.author: danielb987

replies.bodyText: Thanks @danielb987 , good catch, should have been on line above, have uploaded update.
replies.author: icklesteve
